attributes.action: outlaw Dairystix milk sticks on the basis that they are a modern menace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Milk sticks are the things you see on trains,aeroplanes and service stations which hold a portion of milk. Rather than have them in the little pot things these are like plastic versions of sugar sticks. The problem comes when you come to open them as if you don't hold them completely right with no pressure on the stick they squirt everywhere making you smell like milk for the day! So say no to sticks!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
